entries.meaning: A form of viewing device that allows the viewer to see things at a different height level and usually with minimal visibility.

verbs.description: periscope (third-person singular simple present periscopes, present participle periscoping, simple past and past participle periscoped)

entries.meaning: (intransitive) To rise and peer around, in the manner of a periscope.
examples: Thousands of ungainly black-beaked heads would periscope and freeze in the direction of the approaching intruder.
